org.numenta.nupic.monitor.mixin

Class Metric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.monitor.mixin.Metric

  • public class Metric
extends java.lang.Object
    Metric class used in monitor mixin framework. A metric computed over a set of data (usually from a CountsTrace).
    Author:
    Chetan Surpur, cogmission
